text: I have sent among you the pestilence after the manner of Egypt: your young men have I slain with the sword, and have taken away your horses; and I have made the stink of your camps to come up unto your nostrils: yet have ye not returned unto me, saith the LORD.4.10 after…: or, in the way4.10 and have…: Heb. with the captivity of your horses
